full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' PO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS RGYAN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DU BYA BA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' PO GCIG PA'I BSGRUB THABS 'DI NYID, PAn CHEN THAMS CAS MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I BSGRUB THABS KYI MI GSAL RNAMS 'DIR GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG 'DON 'BA' ZHIG BDE BAR SGRIGS PA 'DI NI GRAGS MCHOG DAM PA AER KHE DAR KHANG GNYER BA'I KHA 'DON DU GNAS LNGA RIG ,DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN CHEN PO'I BKA' DRIN BANGS, THA SHAL BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI RJE NYID KYI GSUNGS JI LTAR BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS DU KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,)
